tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
 user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50),
 first_name VARCHAR(50),
 last_name VARCHAR(50),
 email VARCHAR(100),
 age INT,
 preferences JSON
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    profile_image_url VARCHAR(255),
    registration_date TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    user_id INT,
    theme VARCHAR(20),
    language VARCHAR(20),
    notification_enabled BOOLEAN,
    CONSTRAINT preferences_pk PRIMARY KEY (user_id),
    CONSTRAINT preferences_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
 user_id INT,
 theme VARCHAR,
 language VARCHAR,
 CONSTRAINT preferences_pk PRIMARY KEY (user_id),
 CONSTRAINT preferences_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_vr_experiences (
 experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 experience_name VARCHAR,
 duration_minutes INT,
 CONSTRAINT experiences_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    profile_picture BLOB
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
    preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id),
    theme VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    font_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE ARExperiences (
    experience_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VRExperiences (
    experience_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    video_url VARCHAR(255),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_data JSON,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
